actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Frederick Francisco Akers; Susan Ferniz Akers, spouse; Christopher Ferniz Akers, son; and Christina Ferniz Akers, daughter.

summary.text: Declares four named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Frederick Francisco Akers; Susan Ferniz Akers, spouse; Christopher Ferniz Akers, son; and Christina Ferniz Akers, daughter.
